item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 1, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

27. If not React, then what? (249 points | 456 comments)
28. Interview of Robert Shingledecker, Tiny Core Linux and DSL Developer (2009) (68 points | 23 comments)
29. The Kitchen with Two Doors (3 points | discuss)
